array.title: Palindrome Number
array.description: Given an integer x, return true if x is a palindrome, and false otherwise.

array.title: Best Time to Buy and Sell Stock
array.description: Given an array of stock prices, find the best day to buy and sell the stock.

array.title: Single Number
array.description: iven a non-empty array of integers nums, every element appears twice except for one. Find that single one.
